requirements.plaintext: Complete Ritou Escape Plan and Searching for Saimon Jirou

substeps.plaintext: Check the Missing Person Bulletin Boards around Konda Village.
Talk to Saimon Katsumi, just north of the southern Teleport Waypoint in Byakko Plain.
substeps.markdown: Talk to ◀Saimon Katsumi▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Saimon_Katsumi▷, just north of the southern ◀Teleport Waypoint▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Teleport_Waypoint▷ in ◀Byakko Plain▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Byakko_Plain▷.

substeps.plaintext: Talk to Ishikawa in Kujou Encampment, just east of the Teleport Waypoint.
substeps.markdown: Talk to ◀Ishikawa▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ishikawa▷ in ◀Kujou Encampment▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Kujou_Encampment▷, just east of the Teleport Waypoint.

substeps.plaintext: Talk to Ono near the northern gate of the Kujou Encampment.
substeps.markdown: Talk to ◀Ono▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ono▷ near the northern gate of the Kujou Encampment.

substeps.plaintext: Talk to Ogura Yuu at the watch tower to the south-east of the Teleport Waypoint in Kujou Encampment.
substeps.markdown: Talk to ◀Ogura Yuu▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ogura_Yuu▷ at the watch tower to the south-east of the Teleport Waypoint in Kujou Encampment.

substeps.plaintext: Report back to Saimon Katsumi in Konda Village, just west of the southern Teleport Waypoint at his house.
substeps.markdown: Report back to Saimon Katsumi in Konda Village, just west of the southern Teleport Waypoint at his house.

steps.plaintext: Head to Jinren Island and climb to the top of the largest island.
steps.markdown: Head to ◀Jinren Island▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Jinren_Island▷ and climb to the top of the largest island.

steps.plaintext: On the top of the largest island, free "???" from the cage.
steps.markdown: On the top of the largest island, free "???" from the cage.

substeps.plaintext: The key is in the tallest tree on the opposite end of the plateau.
substeps.markdown: The key is in the tallest tree on the opposite end of the plateau.

steps.plaintext: After a small cutscene, the player will be near the Jinren Island waypoint and will start a conversation with "???"
steps.markdown: After a small cutscene, the player will be near the Jinren Island waypoint and will start a conversation with "???"

substeps.plaintext: "???" reveals himself to be Saimon Jirou. He will tell the player to collect 4 Old Stone Slates.
substeps.markdown: "???" reveals himself to be ◀Saimon Jirou▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Saimon_Jirou▷. He will tell the player to collect 4 ◀Old Stone Slates▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Old_Stone_Slate▷.

steps.plaintext: Once the player has all 4 Old Stone Slates, The Farmer's Treasure will appear in the player's journal.
steps.markdown: Once the player has all 4 Old Stone Slates, The Farmer's Treasure will appear in the player's journal.

substeps.plaintext: To get all 4 Old Stone Slates, the player must at least reach the World Quest Cleansing Defilement in Series Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.
substeps.markdown: To get all 4 Old Stone Slates, the player must at least reach the ◀World Quest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/World_Quest▷ ◀Cleansing Defilement▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Cleansing_Defilement▷ in Series ◀Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sacred_Sakura_Cleansing_Ritual▷.
